name: Anitox Ltd. UK
goal: Anitox develops products and services to safely control pathogens and microbes in animal feeds, pet foods and ethanol fermentation systems worldwide. Anitox is headquartered in Georgia, United-States, with operational bases throughout the world.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
Anitox engages with the European Union institutions in the following policy areas:
- Feed additives Regulation
- Animal nutrition, Food Hygiene
- Animal health and welfare
- Biocidal products Regulation
- REACH Regulation
- National programmes for the control of zoonoses (incl. Salmonella)
